/* selectYearEtcList */
SELECT A.YEAR_ETC_ID , A.PROJ_YEAR_ID , A.YEAR_ETC_NM , A.YEAR_ETC_CN , A.YEAR_ETC_GB , A.YEAR_ETC_INFO , A.CREATE_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS CREATE_DTTM , A.MODIFY_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.MODIFY_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS MODIFY_DTTM FROM PTL_YEAR_FOLLOW_ETC A, (SELECT @rownum:= #{rownum, jdbcType=INTEGER}) R WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROJ_YEAR_ID = #{proj_year_id} ORDER BY A.YEAR_ETC_NM DESC

/* selectYearEtcDtl */ SELECT YEAR_ETC_ID , PROJ_YEAR_ID , YEAR_ETC_NM , YEAR_ETC_CN , YEAR_ETC_GB , YEAR_ETC_INFO , CREATE_ID , DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS CREATE_DTTM , MODIFY_ID , DATE_FORMAT(MODIFY_DTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS MODIFY_DTTM FROM PTL_YEAR_FOLLOW_ETC WHERE 1=1 AND YEAR_ETC_ID = #{year_etc_id}
